welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Steinbach am Taunus, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Frankfurt Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Frankfurt Airport, primarily used by Lufthansa and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Under construction and set to open in 2023, this terminal will increase Frankfurt Airport's capacity and modernize its facilities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport, with faster speeds available for purchase.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
